org.numenta.nupic.network.sensor

Class HTMSensorTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.numenta.nupic.network.sensor.HTMSensorTest

  • public class HTMSensorTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Higher level test than the individual sensor tests. These tests ensure the complete functionality of sensors as a whole.
    Author:
    David Ray

      • testHandlesImproperInstantiation

        public void testHandlesImproperInstantiation()
        Tests that the creation mechanism detects insufficient state for creating Sensors.

      • testMetaFormation

        public void testMetaFormation()
        Tests the formation of meta constructs (i.e. may be header or other) which describe the format of columnated data and processing hints (how and when to reset).

      • testMetaFormation_NO_HEADER_FLAGS

        public void testMetaFormation_NO_HEADER_FLAGS()
        Tests the formation of meta constructs using test data with no flags (empty line). This tests that the parsing can proceed and the there is a registered flag of SensorFlags.B inserted for an empty 3rd line of a row header.

      • testCategoryEncoderCreation

        public void testCategoryEncoderCreation()
